sectionText: 1 hour.  Title:  What can I do with a BS in IB?  RESTRICTED TO IB MAJORS.  This weekly seminar will explore a range of life sciences careers and strategies students can use to learn about them and develop their skills and experience in order to prepare for them.  S/U grading based on: Participation in the weekly discussions & class activities lead by SIB alumni, SIB faculty & UIUC career resouce personnel, and a final career presentation.
sectionTitle: What can I do with a BS in IB
